Revered worldwide for their groundbreaking role as 1960s San Francisco-based psychedelic rock pioneers channeling everyone from John Coltrane to Bessie Smith into their own hard-driving sound, Big Brother and the Holding Company introduced the one and only Janis Joplin to the world. Even diehard Big Brother fans well acquainted with the material on the second disc have never encountered it in such pristine condition, both discs benefitting from 24-bit mastering. Big Brother was already a powerhouse despite being together as a unit a relatively short time, and this is where it all began for Janis.
